faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers to common inquiries. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.
faq.question1: What is the cost of the free plan?
faq.answer1: Our free plan is completely free, with no monthly or annual charges. It's a great way to get started and explore our basic features.
faq.question2: How much does the Basic Monthly plan cost?
faq.answer2: The Basic Monthly plan is priced at $15 per month. It provides access to our core features and is billed on a monthly basis.
faq.question3: What is the price of the Pro Monthly plan?
faq.answer3: The Pro Monthly plan is available for $25 per month. It offers advanced features and is billed on a monthly basis for added flexibility.
faq.question4: Do you offer any annual subscription plans?
faq.answer4: Yes, we offer annual subscription plans for even more savings. The Basic Annual plan is $144 per year, and the Pro Annual plan is $300 per year.
faq.question5: Is there a trial period for the paid plans?
faq.answer5: We offer a 14-day free trial for both the Pro Monthly and Pro Annual plans. It's a great way to experience all the features before committing to a paid subscription.
